amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the construction of a baseball facility in Billings, Montana, and to reduce the amounts made available for the Economic Development Initiative and the Community Development Fund.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2814 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 32. Record Vote Number: 335.

Amendment SA 2814 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S11382-11383, S11385-11386, S11397-11398; text: CR S11383) To prohibit the use of funds for the construction of a baseball facility in Billings, Montana, and to reduce the amounts made available for the Economic Development Initiative and the Community Development Fund.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2814 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 32. Record Vote Number: 335.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2814 proposed by Senator Coburn.
